word: LATER ON THE GREAT EVENTS OF THE PATRIARCHAL AGE AND THE EXPERIENCE OF THE PROPHETS WERE PRESENTED TO HER AS BROUGHT OUT IN HER ARTICLES IN TESTIMONIES FOR THE CHURCH, AND IN HER SERIES OF ARTICLES PUBLISHED IN LATER YEARS IN THE REVIEW, THE SIGNS OF THE TIMES, AND THE SOUTHERN WATCHMAN. THESE SERIES, YOU WILL REMEMBER, DEAL QUITE FULLY WITH THE WORK OF EZRA, NEHEMIAH, JEREMIAH, AND OTHER OF THE PROPHETS.
